name: Sesame Street: Elmo's ABCs
overview: Elmo's ABCs is a 1999 educational Game Boy Color video game. It was released in March 1999 in North America. Like Elmo's 123s, it was also released on April 6, 2001 in Europe. The game was made by NewKidCo. Plot: The player must help Elmo with the letters by pressing the “A” button on the Game Boy Color, which can put a letter in a slot. Elmo can go faster, so the player would need to press faster. There are six stages.
